args.text: Pumble is a communication and collaboration app for teams that offers features such as channels, direct messages, threads, file sharing, and video conferencing. It is designed for various industries, including software development, healthcare, and marketing. It has a free plan with unlimited users and message history, and also offers a pro plan with more features. Pumble has received positive reviews for its ease of use and reliability, and offers 24/7 customer support.
